channel.title: Full Summoning Tab [RELEASE]
channel.description:
[CENTER][B]Summoning Interface[/B][/CENTER]
Preview: [URL=http://img219.imageshack.us/i/proofpic.jpg/][IMG]http://img219.imageshack.us/img219/7475/proofpic.jpg[/img][/URL]
Instructions: I made it using Lin's interface maker its pretty simple ik ik but a few ppl requested it so i decided to help them out.
[size=18pt]1'st Open the interface maker and load the file. 2'nd Go to tools and generate code or press F2 3'rd enter ur settings blah blah next next.. 4'th If needed to rename follow on if not Grats ur done 4'th Copy the code and open the Interface renamer 5'th Put the code in the box and click Rename Now![/size]
If you need some help depending on what methods you are using on your client contact me.
Download Link: http://uppit.com/6dyhsrlgm4gn/Summon.rar

item.title: Full Summoning Tab [RELEASE]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

ricky-v:

I made the instructions in red so its more clear now… You open the RS Interface maker and then load the summoning file in file> Load

You mean more clear as in you increased the size tenfold? lolz
Edit: i cant add them in to my server. it dosent work right. and how do you get sprites out of the interface? because i was making a new quest tab and i need the sprites

Read full topic

[CENTER]Summoning Interface[/CENTER]

Instructions: I made it using Lin’s interface maker its pretty simple ik ik but a few ppl requested it so i decided to help them out.

[size=18pt]1’st Open the interface maker and load the file.
2’nd Go to tools and generate code or press F2
3’rd enter ur settings blah blah next next…
4’th If needed to rename follow on if not Grats ur done
4’th Copy the code and open the Interface renamer
5’th Put the code in the box and click Rename Now![/size]

If you need some help depending on what methods you are using on your client contact me.
